page_about.content:
NFC Deck Tracker is a purpose-built mobile application developed to enhance the experience of trading card game (TCG) players. It provides comprehensive tools for deck creation, organization, and real-time tracking—supporting users throughout both the preparation phase and active gameplay.

Leveraging NFC (Near Field Communication) technology, the application enables seamless card interaction, allowing players to monitor card usage in real-time and gain insights through intuitive deck analysis. The platform supports both offline functionality and optional synchronization of user data across devices for added flexibility and reliability.

This application was developed as part of an academic thesis project by NsamaX, Faculty of Science, Silpakorn University.

Version: {version}
